review: Excellent product with wide array of choices. I have not experienced any delays or interruptions while streaming different videos and the video quality has been superb. Very pleased with this purchase.
author: Mr. J "Mr. creativity"

review: I've purchased 2 Roku sticks from Amazon. The first one is 5 stars. The second one could not "find" my WiFi and was returned for credit(since received).Len Kraus
author: Leonard H. Kraus

review: This is my 2nd Roku Streaming Stick!  Love it!!!!!
author: Jessica Long

review: Worked just like a new one!! Thanks.
author: Diana Ball

review: Easy to set up.The Roku Stick can be a little slow.
author: RICHARD BROOKS

review: The remote worked only for the first day
author: Rana

review: This product works great but it does have a little lag when it is starting up. Sometimes the remote will also lose connectivity in which you will need to reset it. I had originally bought this product because I thought I would be able to mirror from my iOS devices. Turns out there is an app that you can download on iOS but it only functions as a remote. It does not actually project what is on the iPhone or iPad to the screen. Also, my package came with a faulty charger cable. Luckily I had an extra cable from a different product that I was able to use. Other than that I have not had any other problems with the device.
author: Diane

review: So much nicer than having one more box in front of my TV. I really like the Roku Stick.
author: D. Perez

review: This was a wonderful gift purchase. Worth its weight in gold!
author: G. Hill
